definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: During the cold night the puddles skimmed over.
sentences.chinese: 夜間寒冷，水窪表層上結成了冰。

sentences.english: Some tiny creatures lived in the pool.
sentences.chinese: 一些小生物生活在水窪裏。

sentences.english: It was too dark to swim in the waterhole upstream.
sentences.chinese: 可惜天黑了，不能去河上游的深水窪游泳。

sentences.english: Hailstones bounce against the grass and splash into the puddles.
sentences.chinese: 頃刻間草地上銀珠亂蹦，水窪裏水花四濺。

sentences.english: Cakes of ice slowly dissolved into puddles.
sentences.chinese: 冰塊慢慢融化成一個個小水窪。

sentences.english: He lieth under the shady trees, in the covert of the reed, and fens.
sentences.chinese: 牠伏在蓮葉之下，臥在蘆葦隱密處和水窪子裏。

definition: to be shaded or concealed by foliage/to conceal/hidden/covert/shade (of a tree)
(bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
enchanting scenery/beautiful surroundings/world of its own
covering the whole land/over hills and dales
water so clear you can see the bottom
to move about/to go from place to place/roving/mobile
